title: How to Draw an Octopus

steps.headline: Sketch the basic shapes of the octopus
Sketch the wireframe for the tentacles.
steps.description: each tentacle should connect to one point on the star shape.

steps.headline: Sketch a circle for each point of the star shape.
steps.description: The circle will determine the thickness of the tentacle.

steps.headline: Sketch the shapes for the tentacles using octopus pictures as references.
Sketch additional details for the suckers and the eyes.
Refine the sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.
Draw the outline over the sketch.
Erase and remove the sketch marks.
Sketch a Circle to be the octopus' head.
Sketch the tentacles and additional details (suckers, cartoon eyes and mouth).
Refine the sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.
Draw the outline over the sketch.
Erase and remove the sketch marks.

text: A Realistic Octopus Sketch the basic shapes of the octopus  Sketch the wireframe for the tentacles. each tentacle should connect to one point on the star shape. Sketch a circle for each point of the star shape. The circle will determine the thickness of the tentacle. Sketch the shapes for the tentacles using octopus pictures as references.  Sketch additional details for the suckers and the eyes.  Refine the sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.  Draw the outline over the sketch.  Erase and remove the sketch marks.  Add color.  A Cartoon Octopus Sketch a Circle to be the octopus' head.  Sketch circles for the tentacles.  Sketch the tentacles and additional details (suckers, cartoon eyes and mouth).  Refine the sketch using a smaller tipped drawing tool.  Draw the outline over the sketch.  Erase and remove the sketch marks.  Add color.
